name: HUNTER BRICK BALL
description: Hunter brick ball - get a golden brick. Break the bricks that prevent you from achieving the long-awaited victory. Hundreds of stages, exciting gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
